## ğŸ“… Interactive Schedule

<div id="schedule-table"></div>

<!-- SheetJS for reading Excel -->
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/xlsx/0.18.5/xlsx.full.min.js"></script>

<!-- Tabulator -->
<link href="https://unpkg.com/tabulator-tables@5.5.0/dist/css/tabulator.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="https://unpkg.com/tabulator-tables@5.5.0/dist/js/tabulator.min.js"></script>

<script>
async function loadAndRenderSchedule(filePath) {
  const res = await fetch(filePath);
  const data = await res.arrayBuffer();
  const workbook = XLSX.read(data, { type: 'array' });
  const sheet = workbook.Sheets[workbook.SheetNames[0]];
  const json = XLSX.utils.sheet_to_json(sheet, { header: 1 });

  const [header, ...rows] = json;
  const startIdx = header.indexOf("Start Time");
  const endIdx = header.indexOf("End Time");

  const dateCols = header.slice(endIdx + 1);

  const tableData = [];
  dateCols.forEach((date, dIdx) => {
    rows.forEach(row => {
      const start = row[startIdx];
      const end = row[endIdx];
      const event = row[endIdx + 1 + dIdx];
      if (event) {
        tableData.push({
          Date: date,
          Time: (start && end) ? `${start} â€“ ${end}` : "",
          Event: event.trim()
        });
      }
    });
  });

  new Tabulator("#schedule-table", {
    data: tableData,
    layout: "fitColumns",
    pagination: true,
    paginationSize: 10,
    columns: [
      { title: "Date", field: "Date", sorter: "string", widthGrow: 1 },
      { title: "Time", field: "Time", widthGrow: 1 },
      { title: "Event", field: "Event", widthGrow: 3 }
    ]
  });
}

loadAndRenderSchedule("schedule.xlsx");
</script>
